entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0150.9878] The disclosure 9954515 - Disclosure - Segment Reporting Disaggregation of Revenue (By Segment and Distribution Channel) (Details) includes the concept us-gaap:Revenues with a value of -1,236,000,000 and the dimension of srt:ConsolidationItemsAxis=us-gaap:IntersegmentEliminationMember. This same line item however was used to report the value of 4,465,000,000 for a busines segment axis with the dimensions of us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=tsn:PorkMember, but with no associated operating member. If a value is reported for a segment then an operating member should be used if there are reconciling items for that line item.
Concept : us-gaap:Revenues Value : 4,465,000,000 Total period : 2023-10-01 to 2024-06-29 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=tsn:PorkMember Decimals : -6
Rule Element Id:9878 Rule version: 26.0.9 - tsn-20240629.htm 8
